nodes.text: King's Galquek, or "Kay-Gee" for short, was a planet located in the Meridian sector of the Outer Rim Territories.
The planet had a rich history involving royalty. During the New Sith Wars, King's Galquek became a battlefield in 1500 BBY at the Battle of King's Galquek, shortly before the Battle of Mizra.
At some point after the formation of the New Republic, Loronar Corporation supported a coup on King's Galquek.
